verses.roman:
tomā dekhi' jihvā mora bale 'kṛṣṇa-nāma'
'āmi--baḍa jñānī'--ei gela ābhimāna

synonyms: tomā dekhi'—by seeing You; jihvā—tongue; mora—my; bale kṛṣṇa-nāma—chants the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; āmi—I; baḍa jñānī—very learned scholar; ei—this; gela ābhimāna—false prestige has gone away.
translation: "Now that I have seen You, my tongue is chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā mantra. The false prestige I felt from being a learned scholar is now gone."
